instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1304: What is A1304? A1304 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Mid 2009 with EMC 2334, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2375..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message:
This Macbook air just comes to me.
It load OS X and screen look ok. Problems is trackpad and keyboard are not working.
I connected USB mouse and it is not working too.
No way to boot ASD.
Any idea where to start?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message: Yes, start to run away really fast from this pile of garbage. Do not even touch it, return to sender.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message: i got a pile of laptops from a customer 3x 2009 and 3 x2011 they are sitting in a box untouched waiting for the customer to pick up

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message: i suggest taking dukes advice, im still a noob

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message: All these MCP79u boards are garbage. There are no new chipsets for them, so there isn't much to be done. Even if it is not a chipset issue now, it will be in a month when it beeps.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1304</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> mid-2009 no keyboard, trackpad, usb-mouse
threads.message: Ok, that is what I want to know. MCP problems. Thanks
